Example: She eats an apple every morning.
The monkey is eating a banana.
The grapes are sweet and fresh.
Mangoes are very popular in Vietnam.
Lime is used to make drinks.
She put a cherry on top of the cake.
The peach tastes sweet and soft.
The pear is ripe and ready to eat.
He bought a bag of fresh plums.
Kiwi is small but full of nutrients.
Dragon fruit has a beautiful color.
Melon is cool and refreshing in summer.
